overview:
Martin is a versatile leader that has developed and launched products across many industries and multiple global regions. Martinâ€™s versatility has enabled him to enter new industries and quickly ascertain what is needed to execute and succeed.

Martin has experience at all sized of companies from early stage start-ups, small to mid size companies, to the biggest of companies with Microsoft and AT&T.

Martin is currently in head of products for several Seattle start-ups working on initiatives in the mobile, social, local, and search segments.

Previously, Martin was in charge of products at INQ Mobile which was at the center of the push to bring together social and mobile through award winning mobile handsets. Prior to that Martin worked in management consulting and at leading companies including AT&T, Microsoft, InfoSpace.

milestones.description: Director of Products, The Peleton Alliance
